Translations.Text: geugeos-eun hananimkkeseo mid-eum-eulo seon-eul haenghaneun jadeul-ege bog-eum jung-ui hanala illeogalodoe naega igeos-eulo neohuiege bosang-eul guhaji anihana gakkaun cheoncheog-e daehan salang-eun je-oe la nugudeunji seon-eul haenghaneun ja hana nim-eun geuege geugeos-eulo bosang-eul deohayeo jul geos-ila sillo hananim-eun gwan-yong gwa seonhaeng-e bodabhasineun bun-isila

geuga hananim-e daehayeo geojis mal handago geudeul-i malhaneunyo hana nimkkeseo wonhasyeossdamyeon geubun-eun geudaeui ma-eum-eul bonghayeo beolyeoss-eulila geuli go hananim-eun geu geojis-eul jegeohago geubun-ui malsseum-eulo jinlileul ibjeunghasyeoss eulila sillo hananim-eun ma-eum-ui bi mil-eul asigo gyesinola
hananim-eun geubun jongdeul-ui hoegae ham-eul bad-a jusa joeleul yongseohayeo ju simyeo neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geosdo algo gyesim-ila
hananim-eun mid-eum-eulo uiloum-eulhaenghaneun ideul-ege gwileul giul-isa geudeul-ege geubun-ui eunhyeleul deohayeo jusa bolsinjadeul-egeneun museoun beol-iiss-eul ppun-ila

hananimkkeseo geubun-ui jongdeul-eul wihae il-yonghal yangsig-eul keuge neomchige handamyeon geudeul-eun jisang-eseo joeag-eul na-eulila geuleona geubun-eun geubun-ui tteus-e ttala jeogjeolhan yang-eul buyeohasi ni sillo geubun-eun geubun-ui jongdeul-eul gwanchalhamyeo jikyeobogo gyesim-ila
salamdeul-i jeolmangsog-e iss-eul ttae bileul naelige hayeo eunhyeleul bepusi neun bundo geubun-isila geuligo geubun eun bohojaija hollo chan-yang bad-eul bun-isila
hananim-ui yejeung-eulo haneulgwa daejiwa geu saie sanjaehan modeun saengmuldeul-i issnola geulihayeo geubun-i wonhasilttae geugeosdeul moduleul jibgyeolsikineun gwonneung-eul gajigo gyesinola
neohuiege jaeang-i il-eonaneun geos-eun neohui sondeul-i eod-eun geos ttaemun-ila geuleona geubun-eun ajig geudeul dae dasuleul yongseohago gyesinila
neohuineun jisang-eseo hoepihal su do eobs-eumyeo hananim oeeneun bohoja do geuligo guwonjado eobsnola
